item.title: 摩根大通称，尽管降息，但现金可能在数月内保持吸引力
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）的分析师说，迫在眉睫的降息可能不会立即刺激人们蜂拥抛出类似现金的工具，因为一些短期政府债券的收益率可能需要几个月的时间才能低于长期债务的收益率。【原文：Looming interest rate cuts may not immediately spur a rush out of cash-like instruments, as yields on some shorter-dated government bonds could take months to fall below those on longer-term debt, analysts at JPMorgan said.】

item.title: 车队工会将于 9 月 16 日会见副总统哈里斯
item.description: 民主党总统候选人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）将于 9 月 16 日与国际卡车司机兄弟会（International Brotherhood of Teamsters）会面，该工会正在考虑是否为其总统竞选背书。【原文：Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris will meet with the International Brotherhood of Teamsters on Sept. 16 as the union considers a potential presidential endorsement.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息称法国埃利斯公司竞购美国制服供应商 Vestis
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国工作场所用品供应商 Elis SA 已向 Vestis 提出收购要约，Vestis 是 Aramark 公司的前制服租赁业务。【原文：French workplace supplies provider Elis SA has approached Vestis , the former uniform rentals business of Aramark , with an acquisition offer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，CBOE 与英国公司合作推出美国私人股票交易平台
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，美国交易所运营商 CBOE 正在与一家总部位于伦敦的科技公司 Globacap 合作，创建一个美国紧密持股公司股票交易平台。【原文：U.S. exchange operator CBOE is partnering with a London-based tech firm, Globacap, to create a U.S. trading platform for shares of closely held companies, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 万豪称大中华区预订窗口期缩短至三天以内
item.description: 酒店运营商万豪国际集团（Marriott International）周四表示，大中华区的一项关键预订指标目前已不足三天，在世界第二大经济体不确定性上升的背景下，旅游计划的谨慎性进一步增强。【原文：Hotel operator Marriott International said on Thursday a key bookings metric in Greater China is now under three days, amplifying caution around travel plans amid rising uncertainty in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 耶伦警告称终止美国清洁能源税收抵免将提高消费者成本
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四警告说，任何试图削减拜登政府的清洁能源税收抵免政策的行为都将提高家庭的成本，并危及正在创造就业机会的美国制造业新投资。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Thursday warned that any attempts to roll back the Biden administration's clean energy tax credits would raise costs for families and jeopardize new investments in U.S. manufacturing that are creating jobs.】

item.title: 中美洲开发银行在美国法院起诉前总裁
item.description: 中美洲经济一体化银行（Central American Bank for Economic Integration）周四表示，已向美国地方法院提起诉讼，指控其前总裁违反一系列市场法规。【原文：The Central American Bank for Economic Integration has filed a lawsuit against its former president in a U.S. district court for allegedly violating a slew of market regulations, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 参议院小组将就俄罗斯武器问题质询美国半导体公司
item.description: 美国参议院常设调查小组委员会周四表示，将就俄罗斯在乌克兰战争中部署的武器中使用美国制造的半导体一事与四大半导体公司举行听证会。【原文：The U.S. Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations said Thursday it will hold a hearing with four major semiconductor companies on the use American-manufactured semiconductors in Russian weapons deployed in the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 最高法院做出裁决后，美国证券交易委员会放弃内部渎职诉讼
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会上个月要求撤销其内部法官正在审理的所有针对会计师的不当行为诉讼，法律专家认为，这是最高法院最近的一项裁决正在削弱该机构执法权力的一个新迹象。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission last month asked for the dismissal of all active misconduct proceedings against accountants sitting before its in-house judges, which legal experts said was a fresh sign that a recent Supreme Court ruling is curtailing the agency's enforcement powers.】

item.title: Snap 因未能保护儿童免受性剥削被新墨西哥州起诉
item.description: 新墨西哥州周四表示，它对 Snapchat 的所有者 Snap Inc 提起诉讼，指控该消息应用程序的政策和设计功能为分享儿童性剥削材料提供了便利。【原文：New Mexico said on Thursday it filed a lawsuit against Snapchat owner Snap Inc , alleging that the messaging app's policies and design features facilitate the sharing of child sexual exploitation material.】

item.title: 巴西大法官要求最高法院合议庭审查对 X 禁令的质疑
item.description: 周四的一份文件显示，巴西大法官努内斯-马克斯（Nunes Marques）已决定要求最高法院全体成员审查政党新党（Partido Novo）提出的质疑社交媒体平台 X 在巴西被暂停服务的案件。【原文：Brazilian Justice Nunes Marques has decided to ask the full Supreme Court to review a case filed by political party Partido Novo challenging the suspension of social media platform X in the country, a document showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 投资者就服装工人权利问题对耐克施加压力
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金承诺支持一项决议，要求耐克公司考虑如何改善服装厂的工作条件。【原文：Investor pressure on Nike is building ahead of Tuesday's annual shareholder meeting, with Norway's sovereign wealth fund pledging to back a resolution demanding the company consider ways it can improve working conditions at garment factories.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 考虑为其人工智能聊天机器人提供更高的订阅价格
item.description: 据 The Information 周四报道，OpenAI 高层已经讨论了为即将推出的大型语言模型（如注重推理的 Strawberry 和被称为 Orion 的新旗舰 LLM）提供更高价订阅的问题。【原文：OpenAI executives have discussed higher-priced subscriptions for upcoming large language models, such as its reasoning-focused Strawberry and a new flagship LLM dubbed Orion, the Information reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+同意将十月增产推迟两个月
item.description: 欧佩克+组织的两位消息人士周四告诉路透社，在原油价格创下九个月来的最低点后，欧佩克+已同意推迟10月和11月的石油增产计划。【原文：OPEC+ has agreed to delay a planned October oil output increase for October and November after crude prices hit their lowest in nine months, two sources from the producers group told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国银行 2024 年第二季度利润猛增 11%，原因是支出减少
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）周四发布报告称，2024 年第二季度美国银行业实现利润 715 亿美元，比上一季度增长 11.4%。【原文：The U.S. banking industry recorded profits of $71.5 billion in the second quarter of 2024, up 11.4% on the prior quarter, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation reported Thursday.】

item.title: 美国服务业 8 月份保持稳定；就业降温
item.description: 8 月份，美国服务业活动保持稳定，但就业增长放缓，这与劳动力市场放缓的趋势一致。【原文：U.S. services sector activity was steady in August, but employment gains slowed, consistent with an easing labor market.】

item.title: 应用数字公司与包括英伟达在内的投资者达成融资协议，业绩大增
item.description: 应用数字公司（Applied Digital）周四早盘股价飙升近 43%，此前该数据中心运营商表示将从包括芯片巨头英伟达（Nvidia）在内的一批投资者那里获得 1.6 亿美元融资。【原文：Applied Digital shares soared nearly 43% in early trading on Thursday, after the data center operator said it would receive $160 million in financing from a group of investors, including chip giant Nvidia .】

item.title: 福特 8 月销量增长 13.4%，主要得益于 SUV 和皮卡的需求
item.description: 福特汽车公司周四称，8月份美国汽车销量增长13.4%，达到182,985辆，主要得益于对SUV和皮卡的强劲需求。【原文：Ford Motor said on Thursday U.S. vehicle sales in August rose 13.4% to 182,985 units, helped by robust demand for its SUVs and pick-up trucks.】

item.title: 美国与国际伙伴一起对先进技术实施新的控制措施
item.description: 美国周四公布了对包括量子计算机在内的先进技术的新管制措施，以与国际伙伴实施的限制措施保持一致。【原文：The United States on Thursday published new controls on advanced technology, including quantum computers, in line with restrictions imposed by international partners.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉 8 月石油出口攀升至四年新高
item.description: 船运数据显示，委内瑞拉 8 月份的石油出口量创下四年多来的新高，这主要得益于委内瑞拉扩大了对中国、美国和欧洲的石油出口量，而美国在选举争端中实施新制裁的风险也在增加。【原文：Venezuela's August oil exports hit their highest in more than four years, according to shipping data, fueled by expanded shipments to China, the U.S. and Europe as the risk of fresh U.S. sanctions grew amid an electoral dispute.】

item.title: 巴西 8 月汽车产量增长，销量下降
item.description: 巴西汽车制造商协会（Anfavea）周四称，8月份巴西汽车产量较7月份增长5.2%，达到259,613辆。【原文：Brazil's auto production rose 5.2% in August from July to 259,613 units, automakers association Anfavea said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 寻求 55 亿澳元贷款以收购 AirTrunk
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士称，Blackstone 领导的财团正在获得约 55 亿澳元（37 亿美元）的一揽子贷款，以帮助为价值 240 亿澳元的 AirTrunk 收购案提供资金，因为这家美国公司正在增加其在亚洲的业务。【原文：A Blackstone-led consortium is taking out an around $A5.5 billion ($3.7 billion) loan package to help fund the A$24 billion AirTrunk buyout, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said, as the U.S. firm increases its Asian exposore.】

item.title: 美国第二季度生产率上调
item.description: 美国第二季度工人生产率的增长速度超过了最初的预期，从而抑制了劳动力成本，这表明通胀压力可能会继续减弱。【原文：U.S. worker productivity grew faster than initially thought in the second quarter, reining in labor costs, suggesting that inflation pressures could continue to subside.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：泄露的迪士尼数据揭示了财务和战略秘密
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，今年夏天在网上泄露的华特迪士尼的数据包括财务和战略信息，以及一些员工和客户的个人身份信息。【原文：Data from Walt Disney that was leaked online this summer included financial and strategy information, as well as personally identifiable information of some staff and customers, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，裁员人数保持低位
item.description: 由于裁员人数仍然较少，上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数有所下降，这可能有助于减轻人们对劳动力市场正在恶化的担忧。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits declined last week as layoffs remained low, which could help to allay fears that the labor market was deteriorating.】

item.title: 有线新闻频道 Newsmax 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 美国保守派有线新闻频道 Newsmax 周四表示，它已秘密申请在美国首次公开募股。【原文：Conservative U.S. cable news channel Newsmax said on Thursday it had confidentially filed for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 纽约银行将收购 Archer，加强资产和财富管理机构的管理账户服务
item.description: 纽约银行（BNY）与Archer公司周四表示，两家公司已同意收购Archer公司，后者是一家技术和运营提供商，将帮助该美国银行扩大对资产和财富管理公司的服务。【原文：BNY has agreed to buy Archer, a technology and operations provider that will help the U.S. bank expand its services to asset and wealth managers, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 8 月私营部门就业人数创 3 年半以来最小增幅
item.description: 8 月份，美国私营雇主的招聘人数创下了 3 年半以来的最低水平，上个月的数据也被下调，这可能暗示着劳动力市场正在急剧放缓。【原文：U.S. private employers hired the fewest number of workers in 3-1/2-years in August and data for the prior month was revised lower, potentially hinting at a sharp labor market slowdown.】

item.title: Visa 前首席执行官加入通用汽车董事会
item.description: 通用汽车公司周四表示，Visa 前董事长兼首席执行官小阿尔弗雷德-凯利（Alfred Kelly）已加入该公司董事会。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday Alfred Kelly, Jr., former chairman and CEO of Visa , has joined its board of directors.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特朗普将采纳马斯克关于政府效率委员会的建议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划在一次演讲中概述一系列经济建议，其中将包括由亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）推荐的政府效率委员会。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump plans to outline a suite of economic proposals in a speech, which will include a government efficiency commission recommended by billionaire Elon Musk, The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing parts of the speech it has seen.】
